org.spongepowered.api.text.message

Interface Message.Translatable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Message<Translation>>, Message<Translation>
    Enclosing interface:
    Message<T>

    public static interface Message.Translatable
extends Message<Translation>
    A Translatable Message is a message with a Translation as content. Whatever locale the client is using translates this message using the translation identifier. In JSON, the content getter maps to the translation identifier.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.text.message.Message

        Message.Score, Message.Selector, Message.Text, Message.Translatable

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, iterator, spliterator
